description:
'''Neofolk''' (originally known as '''apocalyptic folk''') is a [[music genre]] that originally emerged from [[post-punk]] and [[industrial music]] circles during the 1980s. It is characterized by acoustic instrumentation as well as influences from [[dark wave]] and [[Post-Industrial (music genre)|post-industrial]] styles such as [[dark ambient]].   

Notable artists include [[Death In June]], [[Current 93]] and [[Sol Invictus (band)|Sol Invictus]].
